div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 22:53 pm CDT

div.div: A slight chance of rain after 5am. Mostly clear, with a low around 42. Light and variable wind. Chance of precipitation is 10%.

A chance of rain, mainly before 1pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 64. Light and variable wind becoming west 6 to 11 mph in the morning. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
Mostly clear, with a low around 40. West wind around 8 mph.

div.p:
Is your child ready for Kindergarten? As the 2020-2021 school year approaches it is time to get to know our future wildcats. Students must be 5 years old prior to July 31 in order to enroll in kindergarten. The birthday cut off would be July 31, 2015 for the 2020-2021 kindergarten class. We will hold a Kindergarten Round-Up in the Spring, where we will do a kindergarten screening and you can begin the enrollment process.
Kindergarten . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Kindergarten Round-Up

div.p:
The 2019-2020 Class 1 District 15 Basketball Tournament will be hosted by King City February 24-February 29. Teams in our district include Mound City, King City, Stewartsville, South Holt, DeKalb, Nodaway-Holt, and Union Star. All games will be played in the new gym at King City. It is on the south end of the parking lots. No passes will be accepted.
Monday, February 24 @ 7:00 PM - Osborn Girls vs Nodaway-Holt Girls . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about 2019-2020 District Basketball Tournament
